mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PW, MEM_NAME, MEM_NICK, MEM_BIRTH, MEM_DATE) VALUES (member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_nick}, #{mem_birth}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id FROM member WHERE mem_name = #{mem_name} AND SUBSTR(mem_birth, 1, 8) = #{mem_birth}
